short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your stagewise testing experience with pixel-perfect screenshots and more.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides stagewise users with more features to enhance their website testing and review experience.

- Pixel-perfect screenshot of the website.
- Auto-inject the stagewise Companion into all websites reviewed by your team - without adding the companion script snippet manually!
- Get started fast: Our extension is able to either patch or disable the CSP on your website if you don't want to adapt your CSP rules.
